entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then clearing. Local blowing snow late this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
